headline: Momentous Event That Might Unfold Out of Public View
abstract: President Trump’s trial will feature bitter debates and intense legal wrangling. Much of it is likely to unfold behind closed doors.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Americans tuning in to witness electrifying exchanges in the Senate impeachment trial of President Trump might be in for a shock themselves: Lawmakers could pull the C-Span plug and go into closed session at critical moments of debate over the conduct of the trial and the fate of the president.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
